articles.author: Reis Thebault
articles.title: The behind-the-scenes fallout of the Hollywood writers' strike - The Washington Post
articles.description: The Writers Guild of America strike has had a profound impact on a constellation of wacky, ultra-niche and utterly ordinary businesses that orbit Hollywood.
articles.content:

LOS ANGELES The company that rents mortuary props also offers real autopsies, so the Hollywood writers strike wont faze its owners. But the man who designs exact repli… [+9591 chars]
